name: SNOWBALL FIGHT
description: Penguins gather for a classic snowball fight. Dodge and throw to win!

name: FIRE DANCE
description: Penguins twirl and leap around blazing flames. Feel the heat!

name: WATER SPLASH
description: A wave of water splashes across the field, cooling everyone down.

name: SNOW SLIDE
description: Slide down icy slopes for a quick escape.

name: FIRE FLARE
description: A flare of fire lights up the sky.

name: WATER WAVE
description: A refreshing wave sweeps across the battle.

name: SNOW FORT
description: Defend yourself in a mighty snow fort.

name: WATER SWIRL
description: A swirl of water confuses your foe.

name: SNOWMAN BUILD
description: Build a mighty snowman to boost morale.

name: FIRE WALL
description: A wall of fire blocks your opponent's next move.

name: SNOWSTORM
description: A sudden snowstorm covers the arena, changing the game.

name: WATERFALL
description: A powerful waterfall sweeps away obstacles.

name: FIRE SPIN
description: Spin of fire reverses the flow of battle.

name: SNOW SHIELD
description: A shield of snow protects you from harm.
